summary:
Cryptocurrency is digital money that isn't controlled by any government or bank. It's like a special type of online cash. Bitcoin, created in 2009, was the first cryptocurrency. It introduced the idea of a blockchain, a secure way to keep track of transactions.

There are now thousands of cryptocurrencies, each with its own features. They aren't physical coins but are stored in digital wallets. People can buy, sell, and trade them online. Cryptocurrencies have gained popularity as a new way to invest and make transactions without traditional banks.
title: Cryptocurrency
